contactCoordinatorAndAskForLink: To regain access to your account, please contact your coordinator and request a personalized password reset link.
enterValidUsername: Enter a valid username. This value may contain only letters, numbers, and @/./+/-/_ characters.
followTheStepsBelowToInstallTheApp: Follow the steps below to install the app.
linkExpiredOrIncorrect: The link is expired or invalid.
pageYouAreTryingToReachDoesNotExist: The page that you are trying to reach does not exist. Go to dashboard to continue using the app.
passwordIsTooSimilarToUsername: The password is too similar to the username.
phoneNumberIsNotValid: The phone number entered is not valid.
registrationLinkExpired: The registration link is expired. Contact your coordinator or other organization member and ask for a new link.
scrollDownToFindAddToHomeScreenOptionAnd: Scroll down to find Add to Home Screen option and select it.
signupCodeIsMissingFromTheUrl: Signup code is missing from the URL.
successYouCanNowAddAnotherTree: Success, you can now add another tree.
theAppIsNowInstalledAndAddedToTheHomeScr: The app is now installed and added to the Home Screen.
thereAreNoPlantSpeciesAssignedToYourComm: There are no plant species assigned to your community.
wrongPasswordFormat: Wrong password format: minimum 8-character password, with at least a symbol (!,@,#,$,%,^,&,*), upper and lower case letters, and a number.
youHaveNoTreesWaitingForSubmission: You have no trees waiting for submission.
youHaveNotSubmittedAnyTreesYet: You have not submitted any trees yet.
